(@@admin = 1 or patindex('%,' + rtrim(name) + ',%', (select ',' + replace(restrict_users,' ','') + ',' from userinfo2 where id = @@userID and restrict_yn = '1')) <> 0) and admin = 0 and user_yn = 1 and status = '1'

command.text: declare @c varchar(16) select @c = id from @@sysDatabaseName..userinfo2 where name = @name select @c = isnull(@c, '0') select '' as field, '' as message, 'set$ExternalKeyFilter(this,' + @c + ');' as script
